body_html:
@civilmanxx I think you need to specify the --saver flag to freeze_graph, with a SaverDef file:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py#L50
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#Saver
See tf.train.Saver.as_saver_def()
body_text:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py#L50

See tf.train.Saver.as_saver_def()
body:
@civilmanxx I think you need to specify the --saver flag to freeze_graph, with a SaverDef file:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py#L50
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/api_docs/python/state_ops.html#Saver
See `tf.train.Saver.as_saver_def()`
